summary: Add a standalone follower inspired by Redguard available for CBBE Vanilla, CBBE Curvy, CBBE Curvy HDT, UNP body, UUNP 7base, and UUNP 7baseHDT.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=3][size=6]Eva the Redguard Vampire[/size][/size][size=3]
[/size]
Add a standalone follower inspired by Redguard
available for CBBE Vanilla, CBBE Curvy, CBBE Curvy HDT,
UNP body, UUNP 7base, and UUNP 7baseHDT.[size=3]
[/size][/size]
[size=3]Name: Eva the Vampire
Race: Vanilla Redguard Vampire
Body: CBBE and UNP Variant
Body Height: 1.0300 (Female Nord)
Voiced: Female Condecending

Essensial: False
Marrigable: True
Morality: Any Crime

Class: Vampire
Stats: Levels 25 - 150
Extra: 1000 Health, Magika, Stamina
Combat Style: Vampire (Spellsword)

Outfit: Naked Armor Outfit (Playable)
Inventory: -None-
Stats: Glass Armor
Craftable: False
Upgradeable: [size=3]False[/size]

Weapon: Costum Nightangle Sword
Stats: Elven Sword
Craftable: [size=3]False[/size]
Playable: True
Upgradeable: False

[size=3][b][b]Location:
[/b][/b][size=3][size=3][size=3][size=3][size=3]Riften Hall of the Dead[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]
(Look for a standing coffin where she is sleeping)

[b]Required :
[/b]Skyrim.esm[b]
[/b]Update.esm[b]
[/b]Dawnguard.esm
[b]
[/b][b][b]Installation : [/b]
[/b]NMM or copy to data folder[b]

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
[/b]Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder[b]
[size=3][size=3][b]
[size=3][size=3]"Please check out my other recent mod[b]s"[/b][b]
